alert.note: Alert for Cattaraugus; Chautauqua; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:09AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CATTARAUGUS... SOUTHWESTERN ERIE AND NORTHEASTERN CHAUTAUQUA COUNTIES THROUGH 400 AM EDT... At 308 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Fredonia, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Evans, Eden, Silver Creek, Angola, North Collins, Evangola State Park, Angola on the Lake, Sheridan, Forestville, Perrysburg, Farnham, Hamlet, Silver Creek Reservoir, Langford, and Versailles. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 57A and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
